mods.name: Nova Sub Training
mods.author: JakeJames
mods.description:
Warning: Heavy focus on impregnation fetish.
Mod to train Nova to be more submissive during modified scenes.

Adds a new flag called 'NovaSub' which affects modified scenes. Modified scenes can increase or decrease this flag. There are four stages of submissiveness currently with breakpoints at 0, 37, 67, and 91.

Modified Scenes:
- FuckSubbyNovaScene.gd
-- Uses all four stages of submissiveness
--- Slight variations while Nova is already pregnant
- NovaPetPlayScene.gd
-- Replaces the original prompt when at >=67 submissiveness
--- Slight variations at >= 91
--- Includes a special guest appearance..

mods.name: RNGPerks
mods.author: CanInBad
mods.description:
This mod adds 2 perks
1) Dramaturgy (tier 2, cost 4 points, in Combat)
 - Randomly roll effect for either good buff, near down experience, and a item from custom list in a battle, is inside specials
2) Gambler Cum Stud (tier 3, cost 3 points, in Breeder)
 - Get your balls fill up to the brim after you cum with 30% chance

and a Dramaturgy's exclusive item:
**- Flashlight**
   - A weapon use in combat to instantly blind any foe (totally did not check if the opponent have a blindfold or not), is inside specials
   - only have 2 charges

changelog:
   * fixed crashing for new version (0.1.1)
   * fixed chance being 100% (how did i missed this??????)
   * hopfully has mod info in the json named the same as zip

mods.name: Portal Expansion Mod
mods.author: ranchar
mods.description:
Adds additional portal equipment and new content based around portals. Currently on an early test version, so please give feedback. More is planned to be added.

Changelog:
0.0.1: Fixed crash when attempting to 'lose' the improved portal panties, fixed portal rings so they should now stack when taken off. Fixed crash when retrieving portals. Added a couple more scenes.

0.0.2: Fixed softlock when attempting certain actions.

0.0.3: Fixed crashes when attempting rollback. Fixed portal ring variations being obtainable when not intended. Added some messages when attaching portal rings. Added differing effects when multiple linked rings are attached. Fixed incorrectly triggering sleeping and shower scenes when no portal items were equipped.

0.0.4: Added conditions to various buttons so that you should no longer be able to view scenes for bodyparts that you don't have.

0.0.5: Fixed portal panties so they should now show random scenes correctly.

0.0.6: Fixed some scenes not working correctly.

0.1.0: Fixed crash when attempting to access vendomat (again), added more scenes.

0.1.1: Fixed crash when attempting to attach portal rings.

0.1.2: Fixed crash when attempting to attach portal rings (again).

mods.name: PlusCombat
mods.author: Czarro
mods.description:
4 new weapons, listed below:
-Glass Shard, a single-use item that causes the enemy to bleed for 10 turns.
-Lock Sock, a high damage weapon that costs stamina to use but has a chance to knock the enemy down. Not actually made with a lock.
-Metal Bat, an aluminum baseball bat that costs a small amount of stamina to use and has a chance to stun the enemy.
-Scrap Derringer, a makeshift, single-use gun that deals an enormous amount of pain but only has a 1 in 4 chance to fire properly.
Known Issues:
-The Metal Bat and Lock Sock are supposed to have attack animations, but I'm too stupid to make the animations work.
-All 4 weapons can only be obtained through the debug menu since I have no idea how to add them to enemy loot.
-There is a non-zero chance that I fucked up when making the .zip archive.

[b]Then this is the mod for you![/b]

This mod right here alters the base demon species into something more furry, with the removal of all human features and replaced with canine variants.
They still have the unique demon bits, such as the tail, horns, and hooves, but with additional paws, tails and heads, all of which are from the base game, no additional parts. NPCs will spawn with all of them.

[i]This is a conversion and any new demons will spawn with the different parts, existing demons in your save file before downloading (shouldnt) be affected, they will be renamed though[/i]

mods.name: The Flamehearts
mods.author: Bloxborne (aka Phoenix)
mods.description:
What it adds?: This adds a Pathway, Similar to Tavi, where you help a Guard/Engineer, who supposedly has hidden themselves from the captain, And they need your help In trying to get them out of the Space Station, she will offer you a way out too if you help her. There is a Two Diverging Path system depending on what you do to access Phoenix's place. This also adds a few new floor locations allowing you to explore and access different things. It adds some new items and a small crafting system in one of the floors.
Secrets?: Yes, One in each version of the game (Except V0.4Alpha Rn) And yes they do carry over to other versions of the game so it is worth playing the older versions, and yes it should remember your progress when you update the mods to a higher version.
TLDR: New floors, new items new interaction, new escape path (Not Finished Obvi), and smei dynamic choices

mods.name: Fenrir's Custom Console Commands (FensCCC)
mods.author: Fenrir
mods.description:
This mod adds custom console commands.

Current commands:
- no_kids | Clears the nursery database
- species_encounter_chance <default, none, number> | Sets the encounter chance for all species (0.0 -> 10.0)
- gender_encounter_chance <male, female, shemale, herm, peachboy, all | default, none, number> | Sets the encounter rate for either a single gender, or all genders (0.0 -> 1.0)
set_name <characterID | name> | Change the name if any given character within the game

Notes:
Added the ability to change the name of any character (You need to know their ID first. Player's ID is 'pc')

mods.name: Hypertus
mods.description:
[b]WARNING: This contains hyper stuff, if you dislike it then leave[/b]

This mods [b]adds[b] [i](not replace)[/i] new body parts that just are like the normal ones but you can upgrade them in a new skill tree that comes with this mod.
Said body parts are in form of breast, penises, vagina, and anus.
This mod also have capability layers that use the looks of your favorite body parts mod, including ones from species mod that add one of the 4 body part categories mentioned.

You can gain experience points of said skill tree by invest in vanilla perks and then sleep, each time you wake up you will be notified how much of them you get.
You can then spend those point to add ridiculous amount of perks to your body parts.
Please do note that some perks might be hidden due to not meeting the requirement for the perk.

There is a draft of the story but it isn't complete in anyway and some glimpse of it can be read in the perks' description.

There are compatibility layers that make all species including the modded one have hyperable version of them

You can transform your or your foe's parts to hyperable with Personal Bluespace Anomaly Emitter. You need to finish the Alex's portal quest to get one from his shop

Has compatibility layer between these mods:
  - Synth Bodyparts
  - Fluffy Bodyparts
  - Avali Species Bodyparts
  - Ace's Aviary Addon Bodyparts
  - Trans Scar Chest
  - Crow Species Bodyparts
  - Deer Species Bodyparts
  - Knotted Horse Cock
  - Barbed Equine Penis
  - Spined Dragon Penis

If you have any feedback send it in #mods-discussion and ping me,
or open an issue on [url]https://github.com/CanInBad/HypertusMod/issues[/url].

# Changelog
 * Fixed crashing when selecting hyperable bodyparts inside datapack character creator
 * Made all penises to use floatinput in datapack creator
 * Now has "configurable" settings, end users need to install additional mod(s) to enable/configure them. This is due to limitation of options menu itself.
 * Upgrade to 0.1.4
 * Bump version to release 5
## Backend stuff
 * Now supports species in the json. Please note that this is rushed and requires some tweaking. To learn more please see [url=https://github.com/CanInBad/HypertusMod/]how it works in repo[/url]

mods.name: Improved Inmate Cuffs
mods.description:
Tired of your slaves always finding a way to slip those cuffs? Well rest easy with the new and improved Inmate cuffs. These enhanced sets of wrist and ankle cuffs have been developed to all but guarantee those pesky slaves will never get them off. Each one is modified with the patented locking system that makes the those snazzy collars from the BDCC so infamous.
Available now for a limited time only at your nearest Vendomat for whopping bargain of only 6 work credits.

Seriously thou. I made these after a pesky slave was actually making progress in removing a lv 999 wrist cuffs.
They are a modified pair of Iron wrist Cuffs and Iron ankle Cuffs with the Impossible to remove effect added. 

You can buy them from the Vendomat for 6 creds each under the names: Improved Iron Wrist Cuffs and Improved Iron Anle Cuffs. 

Why 6 credits? Because I'm feeling vindictive and want slaves to suffer as I did figuring out how to get this mod to work.

Special thanks to Brevman for inspiring me to get off my lazy butt and figure out how to make these. And to CanInBed who went out of their way to help me fix a issue that was preventing me from getting this to work.

-Edit-
Slaves wearing this and chained up does not seem to work now. The game acts as if there are no restraints. Still seems to work on other npc's though. Going to need to investigate further.

mods.name: Goo Bondage
mods.description:
Adds new restraints with custom effects. If you like weird and goopy bondage things, you might like this. These are added to the pool of NPC restraints and The Announcer's shop.

Mouth:
- Goo Mask
Torso:
- Goo Boobs
- Gooey Corset
Penis:
- Null Bulge (P)
Vagina:
- Null Bulge (V)
Anus:
- Sentinel Plug

Version 2.0 adds the following:
- Gooey Vest, a variant of the Gooey Corset that combines it with Goo Boobs
- Gooey Lingerie, a Gooey Vest that includes crotchless panties
- Latex Cups, a non-restraint version of Goo Boobs that's worn as a bra
- Latex Funwear, a non-restraint version of Gooey Lingerie that's worn as outerwear
- Crotchless Panties

Goo Boobs and Goo Mask are designed to alter one of the character's body parts on equip and restore it when unequipped, but the on-equip code is only called if you manually "Put On" in the inventory or have it forced on you in sex. Debug commands (i.e. "Force Smart Lock") and the checkpoint guard won't call it. These items will be missing some effects/visuals in those cases, so I've excluded them from the checkpoint guard's available restraints. Could probably fix with an override, but I'm avoiding overrides with this mod.
